mapper.insert: insert into experiments (experimentName, status, startDate, endDate, experimentTypeId, investmentId, reportId, labId) values(#{name}, #{status}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{experimentType.id}, #{investment.id}, #{report.id}, #{lab.id})
mapper.select: select experimentId from experiments order by experimentId desc limit 1

select experiments.experimentId, experiments.experimentName, experiments.status, experiments.startDate, experiments.endDate, experiments.experimentTypeId, experimentTypes.expTypeName, experiments.investmentId, investments.amount, investments.bank, investments.clientId, clients.clientName, clients.clientTypeId, clientTypes.clientTypeName, experiments.reportId, reports.reportName, reports.link, experiments.labId, labs.labName, labs.institutionId, labs.locationId, institutions.institutionName, locations.city, locations.country, experimentGroups.scientistId, scientists.scientistId, scientists.firstName, scientists.lastName, scientists.degreeId, degrees.degreeId, degrees.degreeName, degrees.numOfYears from experiments inner join experimentTypes on experiments.experimentTypeId = experimentTypes.expTypeId inner join investments on experiments.investmentId = investments.investmentId inner join clients on investments.clientId = clients.clientId inner join clientTypes on clients.clientTypeId = clientTypes.clientTypeId inner join reports on experiments.reportId = reports.reportId inner join labs on experiments.labId = labs.labId inner join institutions on labs.institutionId = institutions.institutionId inner join locations on labs.locationId = locations.locationId inner join experimentGroups on experiments.experimentId = experimentGroups.experimentId inner join scientists on experimentGroups.scientistId = scientists.scientistId inner join degrees on scientists.degreeId = degrees.degreeId
where experiments.experimentId = #{id}
select scientistId from experimentGroups where experimentId = #{id}
